scripts.build: rm -rf dist && yarn run build:types && yarn run build:css && yarn run build:js
scripts.build:js: tsup src/index.ts --format esm --sourcemap --target es2020 --tsconfig tsconfig.build.json && node ../../../scripts/write-artifacts-manifest.mjs --dir dist esmEntry=index.js classModule=index.js
scripts.build:umd: tsup src/jquery-touchspin-tailwind.ts --format iife --global-name TouchSpinTailwind --no-dts --sourcemap --target es2018 --outDir devdist/umd --external=none
scripts.build:iife-complete: tsup src/touchspin-tailwind-complete.ts --format iife --global-name TouchSpinTailwindComplete --no-dts --sourcemap --target es2020 --outDir devdist/iife --external=none
scripts.build:test: yarn run build:deps && node ../../../scripts/guard-prod-build.mjs packages/core packages/renderers/tailwind && tsc -p tsconfig.testbuild.json && tsup src/TailwindRenderer.ts --format iife --global-name TailwindRenderer --sourcemap --target es2020 --outDir devdist/iife --external=none && yarn run build:iife-complete && node ../../../scripts/write-artifacts-manifest.mjs --dir devdist esmEntry=index.js classModule=TailwindRenderer.js iifeEntry=iife/TailwindRenderer.global.js iifeComplete=iife/touchspin-tailwind-complete.global.js && node ../../../scripts/extract-framework-assets.mjs --renderer tailwind
scripts.watch: concurrently "tsc -p tsconfig.build.json --watch --emitDeclarationOnly" "tsup src/index.ts --format esm --watch --sourcemap --target es2020 --tsconfig tsconfig.build.json" "yarn watch:css"
scripts.test: node ../../../scripts/pre-test.mjs packages/renderers/tailwind/tests && PLAYWRIGHT_TSCONFIG=../../../tsconfig.playwright.json TS_BUILD_TARGET=dev playwright test --config=../../../playwright.config.ts packages/renderers/tailwind/tests --reporter=list
